content.description: An author is considering publishing an e-book using a Creative Commons license. In which of the following situations would it be better for the author to use a Creative Commons license instead of a traditional copyright?
content.question: The author wants to make the e-book available as a free download.The author wants to prevent people from sharing copies of the e-book on peer-to-peer networks.The author wants to allow people permission to use and modify the e-book.

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Evaluate the use of computing based on legal and ethical factors.
